metadata.name: METAKICKS PORTAL KEY PREMIUM #1
metadata.description: The Metakicks Portal Key acts like a pass, and is your key to the Metakicks universe. Each key holder is eligible for monthly physical airdrops and retail drops of highly coveted Sneakers & Streetwear, claimable in your inventory on https://metakicks.sneakmart.com/. The key also allows you to have exclusive access to the first Metakicks boxes drop at a reduced price and be qualified for unique airdrops.
